review: The Fire TV stick works great.  My issue is the lack of time to watch TV.
author: Jannet Deveny "JC"

review: The Fire TV Stick was so easy to install and use - even for someone not too tech savvy like me. I love it and have recommended it to family members.
author: Native Texan

review: Stop reading this and order the Amazom Fire Stick!
author: Steven Mysel

review: Got Several  Sticks And there amazing ..Has tons of apps .. I was even able to drop in a few custom apps for free Live TV .. Good Bye cable bill ... hahaha  See ya don't want to be ya .... Cord Cutting is where its at.....
author: Jaime P.

review: Other then a very cheap quality plastic remote... Everything is good...
author: Hardik Patel

review: Solid device.. Burns through far more data than the chromecast. The video quality is laggy on any app that is not the amazon pre bundled video servce. Hulu and Netflix both suffer from excessive lagging. Good for what it is, and invaluable if you are a prime member. It far exceeds the apps on the xbox and playstation. Not an all in one solution for varied streaming services.
author: KCS316
